code: export const mapLangToCurrency=lng=>lng!==null&&lng!==void 0&&lng.startsWith("ja")?"JPY":lng!==null&&lng!==void 0&&lng.startsWith("en")?"USD":"IDR";export const mapLangToLocale=lng=>lng!==null&&lng!==void 0&&lng.startsWith("id")?"id-ID":lng!==null&&lng!==void 0&&lng.startsWith("ja")?"ja-JP":"en-US";export function formatMoneyFromIDR(idr,currency,fx,locale){const rateRow=(fx||[]).find(r=>r.currency===currency);const rate=Number((rateRow===null||rateRow===void 0?void 0:rateRow.idr_per_unit)||1);const value=Number(idr)/(rate||1);return new Intl.NumberFormat(locale||"en-US",{style:"currency",currency}).format(value);}
